attributes.action: Give London a referendum on removing the position of London Mayor
attributes.additional_details: We believe that the current London Mayor does not listen to the people or respect democracy, and in the absence of the public being able to remove him ahead of an election we believe there should be a referendum in London on removing the position of London Mayor.
attributes.background: We want the Government to give the people of London a referendum on removing the position of London Mayor.
